column4: hello guys, i just installed ubuntu on this system, and it also has win7 on it, along side. is there a way to expand my ubuntu partition for apps, once installed. i'd like to keep my current install but add more space, for more apps
can i use the methods here to do a ubuntu resize http://www.howtoforge.com/linux_resizing_ext3_partitions

you can resize partitions in liveCD. I suggest you resize the ntfs in win7 then resize the linux partition in liveCD into the free space. I also suggest you ensure your backups are up to date in case of catastrophe
